title: naivEdyava koLLo
sahitya:
naivEdyava koLLo nArAyaNasvAmi divya SaDurasAnnavaniTTenO


caraNam 1    ghama ghamisuva shAlyanna panca bhakSya amrta kUDida divya paramAnnavO 
ramA dEviyaru svahastadi mADida pAka bhUmi modlAda dEviyaru sahiteLataNa
    caraNam 2    aravattu shAka lavaNa shAka modalAda sarasa mosaru butti citrAnnavO 
parama mangaLa appavu atirasa haruSadindaliyiTTa hosa tuppavO
    caraNam 3    oDeyamboDe tithivaDeyu tinthiNi oDeya eDage oDene baDiside 
drDhavAda padArttangaLanella iDiside oDeya shrI purandara viTTalane uNNO
